content: p7 8 7 p2tog p1 turn begin toe row 4 slip 1 k8 9 8 ssk k1 turn continue working one more stitch until all the stitches have been worked you should toe end on a knit row with 17 20 21 stitches decrease round k1 ssk knit across to last remaining do not turn work begin gusset 3 stitches before first instep marker k2tog wiki waki woo copyright 2011-2012 adrienne fong all rights reserved http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry k1 slip marker k1 ssk knit across to last rounds even twice work decrease round 3 stitches before second instep marker once knit 1 round even 3 times work k2tog k1 decrease round only until 18 20 22 sts remain use kitchener stitch to close toes work decrease round once knit 3 rounds even work decrease round once knit 2 weave in all loose ends written instructions chart a multiples of 11 12 13 round 1 p round 2 k round 3 p round 4 k round 5 k to last st yo k1 round 6 yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k3 3 4 yo k1 5 times yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k5 5 6 round 7 k to end yo round 8 k1 yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k3 3 4 yo 5 times k1 yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k4 4 5 round 9 k to last st yo k1 round 10 yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k3 3 4 yo k1 5 times yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k5 5 6 rounds 11-12 k repeat rounds 1-12 for pattern chart b worked over 33 36 39 instep sts row1 & 2 k row 3 yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k3 3 4 yo k1 3 times row 4 k row 5 k1 yo k3 4 4 ssk k2tog k3 3 4 yo 3
